testcase.name: Verify if place is being Successfully added using AddPlaceAPI - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload with "Lulu" "Odia" "Barang".........................passed When user call "ADDPLACEAPI" with "post" http request.......................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And "scope" in response body is "APP".......................................passed And verify place_id created maps to "Lulu" using "GETPLACEAPI"..............passed
